allow: Bash(cmd /c "C:\\Python313\\python.exe -c ""import zipfile, xml.etree.ElementTree as ET; z=zipfile.ZipFile\(r''C:\\Users\\vwill\\Documents\\Tyler Project\\Project 1\\Universal_12-Minute_Quiz_Spec_v2_1E_FINAL2 \(1\).docx''\); tree=ET.parse\(z.open\(''word/document.xml''\)\); ns=''http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main''; paragraphs=[]; [paragraphs.append\(''''.join\([t.text for t in para.iter\(''{''+ns+''}t''\) if t.text]\)\) for para in tree.iter\(''{''+ns+''}p''\)]; print\(chr\(10\).join\([p for p in paragraphs if p]\)\)""")
